title.rendered: Do your kids play Minecraft?  (games, parents)

content.rendered:
Hello dear parents,
Hello dear MC kids,

I would like to briefly introduce our latest project and ourselves and hope that we can still win over one or the other. It actually started from a “hobby post” here at GF, where someone (a grandpa) was looking for a server or information about a child-friendly Minecraft server for his grandchildren. Then the thought came back to me 35+ (same father of 3 boys) “Man, you know the problem from somewhere” there might be a need for a child-friendly server network for some other parents, which one just builds up differently (with a few ideas). , present? Because playing forever with dad or “grandpa” in this case is “boring”

Well what can I tell you, after I was allowed to write a post in the Minecraft Germany group (FaceBook) and got a huge wave of positive feedback from other parents, I was able to find a like-minded father (also 35+) with the same Thoughts with which I am now implementing the idea with the help of a sponsoring partner.

A suitable website (forum) with some tips, rules and a description of our project are also in the works, the servers themselves are already in the starting blocks.

In our network, children should not be able to “independently” try to get an entry on the whitelist (lack of control), but rather the parents.

We are parents ourselves and also “online gamblers”, however, we find that far too many parents are not interested in what (FSK) or how long their children play something on the Internet (online). Minecraft is the most harmless game that is available “online”, unfortunately the community is not easy and therefore unfortunately often casts a bad light on the game, especially through many Youtube projects.

We want that and much more with our idea behind minecraft-kids.online in relation to Minecraft changebecause whoever is interested (in his children) to whom it is important what their child is up to and where, that their child (and oneself) does not have their pocket money pulled out of their pants with “cosmetic bells and whistles” from xyz-HD / ab++ft and Co. servers!

We are even in the process of having a plugin developed where a player is given a “daily playing time” (by his parents) and the plugin then automatically blocks the player from our server when he has “reached his daily playing time with us “. Can then only “gamble with us” again the next day.

Would you let your child play on such a network and does that sound interesting to some of you?
